extendedInfo.description: CaringBridge for Android keeps you connected to family and friends during any type of health event, wherever you are. Post updates, view messages, manage photos, and much more, all from your Android device. You can also: â¢	Start a CaringBridge site. â¢	Remove sites from your site list.â¢	Get notified of journal updatesâ¢	Donate to CaringBridge on your mobile device.CaringBridge is a nonprofit offering many ways to care for each other during any type of health event. Thanks to those who donate, we are available 24/7 to anyone, anywhere at no cost.

reviews.title: Great...in theory.
reviews.comment: The website is great, and I love the app....except...the app randomly closes on it\'s own.  Only started recently.  Fix this and the app is great.
reviews.author: Nick Weaver

reviews.title: It\'s a great app to have
reviews.comment: It is really handy to jump on the phone app and stay connected to my family during this time of my Mom\'s cancer treatments. The only problem I have is the forced closes, but they can be worked around. I wish we could heart things in the guestbook and journals like the website, but hopefully that is in a future update?? Overall it is a handy app to have.
reviews.author: Kiana Goplen

reviews.title: Great when it works!
reviews.comment: I love the idea & have used the website for a year now to keep up with a friends little girl with cancer & until today the app worked fine. It gave me updates of new journals, allowed me to access her page quickly & easily but today as soon as I click on the app it says it has stopped & will not let me see the new update journal. I\'m disappointed but when the app works its wonderful!
reviews.author: Kayley Wilson

reviews.comment: Couldn\'t even register.  Kept telling me my email address had to be less than 150 characters.  Mine is 26 characters.  Fail.
reviews.author: Matt Beaver

reviews.title: Nice idea. Poor execution
reviews.comment: The idea behind this app is great. Unfortunately, it has bugs that make at the very least difficult to use. Since the last update I can\'t even view a site, I enter the name, see an indeterminate progress spinner, then nothing.
reviews.author: Cameron Mayer

reviews.title: Force closes
reviews.comment: Works good for getting the journal updates but force closes every time I try to view a picture. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: John Walsh

reviews.comment: Great site providing info and bringing families and friends together in times of need.
reviews.author: MeLee Early

reviews.title: Laura
reviews.comment: This ap alerts me that new journal posts have been added, but then will not allow me to read them. Also, the majority of the time when I search for my friend\'s page, it says it does not exist even though I know the name I am typing is absolutely correct. So, basically the ap is worthless.
reviews.author: Laura Cook

reviews.title: Would like to see and add hearts
reviews.comment: I so appreciate having this service during our families health crisis, but would like to see and add hearts from the mobile app.  Also, I do have to close the program and re-emter to be able to refresh guestbook comments
reviews.author: Charleen Jongejan Harder

reviews.title: A bit buggy
reviews.comment: Wish there was a way to contact the developer so I can report bugs. Nothing in-app and no email address given in the usual place on Google Play.  Just found that it is listed under \"What\'s New.\"
reviews.author: David P

reviews.title: Needs technical help
reviews.comment: Keeps force crashing
reviews.author: Jill Meenan

reviews.title: App is junk. Use browser
reviews.comment: Constantly crashes. Waste of time.
reviews.author: Mark VanOuse

reviews.title: This app simply does not work - ever! Please fix!!!
reviews.comment: This app simply does not work - ever! Please fix!!!
reviews.author: Denise Anderson

reviews.title: buggy
reviews.comment: most of the time my site list won\'t come up. I have to go to my droid\'s browser and log in there. unfortunate because when it works correctly it\'s a great app.
reviews.author: Laurie Cornett Cross

reviews.title: Garbage.
reviews.comment: Constant crashes. Really poorly coded.
reviews.author: Sam Miller

reviews.title: Great idea.
reviews.comment: It is a great way to get information when it works!  The program constantly shuts down before you can even sign in.  Hopefully, there will be an update to fix this glitch.
reviews.author: Stefanie Keeland

reviews.title: Links
reviews.comment: Links such as YouTube are unavailable in the app. It won\'t let you click on them if someone posts a link in their journal.
reviews.author: Danial Logston

reviews.title: Frustrating
reviews.comment: Idea of app is great! But I can\'t even log into the journal without the app freezing up and then foreclose. Every single time.
reviews.author: Megan Blake

reviews.title: Better than Facebook
reviews.comment: Awesome
reviews.author: Robert Sams

reviews.title: only works once
reviews.comment: app crashes every second time you open it. Better to just access the site with your browser.
reviews.author: Ken McGregor
